page.title: 12Industry in the area.
page.content: There is no large scale industrial development in the area which is predominantly residential. There is a selection of small industrial estates with mainly low rise buildings which are generally well planned and pleasant to look at. The Willow Lane Estate is built in the the valley of the River Wandle and has industries which make use of the proximity of water.Many of the nearly fifty firms are concerned with engineering in all shpes and sizes. There is a small estate near Wrythe Green which contains engineering works, storage areas together with builders and wood yards. The small estate at Hackbridge also contains engineering works and the offices of S.G.B.(Scaffolding Great Britain).
